title: A2UI Common Types
description: Common type definitions used across A2UI schemas.

NodeBinding.description: Binds a property to a value in the data model.

node.description: The ID of the node to bind to. If omitted, binds to the current data context (e.g. the current item in a list).

key.description: The property key to access on the target node. Required if the target is a Map/Object. Omit if the target is a primitive or if you want the object itself.

FunctionCall.description: Invokes a named function on the client.

call.description: The name of the function to call.

returnType.description: The expected return type of the function call.

DynamicString.description: Represents a value that can be either a literal string, a binding to a string in the data model, or a function call returning a string.

DynamicNumber.description: Represents a value that can be either a literal number, a binding to a number in the data model, or a function call returning a number.

DynamicBoolean.description: Represents a value that can be either a literal boolean, a binding to a boolean in the data model, or a function call returning a boolean.

DynamicStringList.description: Represents a value that can be either a literal array of strings, a binding to a string array in the data model, or a function call returning a string array.

id.description: The unique identifier for this component.

weight.description: The relative weight of this component within a Row or Column. This is similar to the CSS 'flex-grow' property.

Checkable.description: Properties for components that support client-side checks.

checks.description: A list of checks to perform. These are function calls that must return a boolean indicating validity.

DynamicValue.description: A value that can be a literal, a binding, or a function call returning any type.

oneOf.description: A static list of child component IDs.
A template for generating a dynamic list of children from a data model list. The `componentId` is the component to use as a template.

binding.description: The binding to the list of data nodes in the Hybrid Adjacency Map.
